${alias}.id, ${alias}.author_id AS authorId, ${alias}.title, ${alias}.content, ${alias}.cmt_cnt AS cmtCnt, ${alias}.watched_cnt AS watchedCnt, ${alias}.create_time AS createTime, ${alias}.update_time AS updateTime,
